title: PM accepts resignation of NAB chairman
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday accepted the resignation of Chairman National Accountability Bureau (NAB) Aftab Sultan.
The Chairman NAB presented the resignation presented to the prime minister citing personal reasons, here at the PM House.
The prime minister appreciated the services of Aftab Sultan and lauded his honesty and uprightness.
